title: Can you still get a border if rank goes up in preseason?
body:
I'm getting my smurf to plat and I need 1 more win to get Platinum, but it's preseason. Am I just going to get a Gold border or what's gonna happen?

Thanks

replies.body:
If you were gold when the season ended then yes, you will just get a gold border. 

Your rank in the preseason will not give you any rewards, only your rank during the actual season will give you rewards.
